page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: TAG:This is the most popular game. There is a 'catcher'who has to chase and catch someone.This child then becomes the catcher (or is 'on it'. TREE TAG: You can't be 'tagged' if you can climb a tree out of reach. STUCK IN THE MUD:If you are tagged you have to stand with your legs apart until everyone else is caught. BRITISH BULLDOGS:The catcher calls a name;that person tries to cross a gap but if caught becomes the catcher. HIDE AND SEEK:The catcher has to find the people who are hiding. SIXTY BUDS:The catcher has to tag one of the hiders who then becomes 'on it' in the next game. FOOTBALL and CRICKET are popular games also SKIPPING or playing HOPSCOTCH. OFF-GROUND TAG:You stand on a step or hang off a branch to avoid tagging and becoming 'on it'.
